config.p1: Below you can change the configuration of this webshop. The configuration is immediately applied and can be used in

reset.p1: Everytime Gofetch imports new data from this webshop, your database is updated with a timestamp that represents the time where it took place. Data is imported as frequent as your schedule allows for
reset.p2: If you reset a timestamp, the shop will be immediately queued for new data to be imported

attributes.got_products_created_since_last_request_: Got products created since last time
attributes.got_products_updated_since_last_request_: Got products updated since last time
attributes.got_orders_created_since_catch_all_date_: Got orders created a while back
attributes.got_orders_created_since_last_request_at: Got orders created since last time
attributes.got_orders_updated_since_catch_all_date_: Got orders updated a while back
attributes.got_orders_updated_since_last_request_at: Got orders updated since last time
attributes.got_orders_open_since_1x_at: Got orders that were open last time we checked (time interval 1)
attributes.got_orders_open_since_2x_at: Got orders that were open last time we checked (time interval 2)
attributes.got_orders_open_since_3x_at: Got orders that were open last time we checked (time interval 3)
attributes.got_orders_open_since_4x_at: Got orders that were open last time we checked (time interval 4)
